results.title: Buses of Migrants Arrive at Kamala Harris’s Home on Christmas Eve
results.abstract: About 130 migrants from Texas were bused to the vice president’s home on one of the coldest Christmas Eves on record in the nation’s capital.

results.abstract: A South Korean tour group’s van became stuck in the snow outside a house in Williamsville, N.Y. They spent the weekend with the residents — who luckily had a well-stocked kitchen.
